column4: So I created a new user, did not select "Administrator Access" or whatever, then deleted the original user. Am I screwed, IE Do I need to reinstall ubuntu?
No.  You'll need to reboot, at GRUB (hit escape right after POST) select "recovery console", then add the user you have to the admin group.  with usermod -G admin -a username
once you've done that, type 'init 2' and you'll finish booting like normal
No, dist-upgrade doesn't do that (it can, but there's other things you need to do beforehand)
